title: Jal Sarovar - ML-Based Water Quality Monitoring
short_description: Built India's first ML-based unified water quality monitoring system
full_description: Built India's first ML-based unified water quality monitoring system, integrating public infrastructure and residential communities with an autonomous IoT system for contamination forecasting. Trained ML models for contamination detection, achieving 92% accuracy. Deployed across 7 public sites and residential communities, serving 800+ residents.
